text:
Absolutely loved my visit to the Flower Dome! The entire place is beautifully maintained, cool and comfortable, and perfect for a leisurely wander surrounded by nature’s finest. I was fortunate to visit during the Tulip Festival, and it was nothing short of spectacular.

The dome was bursting with vibrant tulips in an incredible range of colours and varieties. The themed displays, complete with a charming Dutch windmill and scenic backdrops, made it feel like a slice of the Netherlands right here in Singapore. Everything was thoughtfully arranged, with informative signs that added a lovely educational touch.

I highly recommend a visit to the Flower Dome — especially if you can catch one of their seasonal festivals. It’s a floral haven that’s enjoyable for all ages!

We visited the Flower Dome during the theme of Tulipmania and it was absolutely gorgeous. The exhibit had just kicked off so the tulips were still fresh and not completely opened. It’s indoors and air conditioned so definitely a place to cool off from the heat. There are plenty of plant varieties ranging from cactus to local plants and international favourites.

The Flower Dome at Gardens by the Bay was amazing! Super cool inside (literally and figuratively) with flowers from all over the world. Great spot for photos, relaxing strolls, and escaping the heat. My family loved it, especially the themed displays. Totally worth checking out if you're in Singapore.

The Flower Dome at Gardens by the Bay is a breathtaking, air-conditioned conservatory filled with vibrant blooms and plants from around the world.

The Flower Dome has fun themed flower displays that change throughout the year. From cherry blossoms to tulips, each setup is colorful, creative, and makes every visit feel new and special.

A nice place for nice tourist attraction. Good location for family gatherings, enjoying the wonderful views of the different event displays works.

It has great places for horticulture lovers too.
No to mention, there are others near by iconic places to visit.

From 29 May 2025 the term will be the jurassic world. It will be a new event in the Cloud forest.
